title: Ojiisan no Lamp
synopsis: When a young boy named Tooichi stumbles upon an old lamp in his grandfather's shed, he mistakes it for a toy and takes it outside to play. When his grandfather discovers this, he reprimands the boy and begins recounting the story behind the artifactâ€”of how a small, traditional Japanese town became Westernized.
